pullRequest.title: DBZ-1935 fixed broken links and anchors
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://issues.redhat.com/browse/DBZ-1935
also added .asciidoctorconfig for improved preview and validation.
If you think the contents of .asciidoctorconfig should be in antora.yml, please let me know and I'll move them.
I've used the latest preview version 0.30.51 of the AsciiDoc IntelliJ plugin to run "Analyze | Inspect code..." with all AsciiDoc validations. With these changes it doesn't show any errors.
All links are fixed to my best knowledge, let me know if any more fix-ups are required.

nodes.bodyText: This one looks not quite right?
